properties.significance: Shushan serves as the capital of the Persian Empire during the time of Esther's story and is where the plot against the Jews unfolds.
properties.name: Shushan

properties.summary: The Book of Esther is a book in the third section (Ketuvim) of the Hebrew Bible. It relates the story of a Jewish woman in Persia, known as Esther, who becomes queen and thwarts a genocide of her people. The story takes place during the reign of King Ahasuerus in the First Persian Empire.
properties.name: Book of Esther
